title: Unlock champions Beta Client
body: When are we going to be able to unlock new champions on the beta client?

replies.body: The store is available in the updated version, so new content should be available like new skins and champions.  If there's an issue, be sure to report it to the client devs at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  The store's been undergoing testing, so I'm confident things will be fine!
